loginDescription: Welcome back! Enter your credentials to continue.
signupDescription: Sign up to start your journey with the right guidance!
firstAssessmentIntro: Please fill in the child's basic information to begin the first assessment. Based on the selected challenges, relevant questions will be shown in the next steps.
challengeInstruction: Please answer the following questions based on the child's behavior or condition in this area.
summaryDescription: Here's a quick overview of your inputs. You can go back to edit or proceed to submit.
